title: Julie Beauty Salon
description: Julie Beauty Salon is a glam up makeover game where you run a beauty salon.  Every makeover is a mini masterpiece in this fun, stylish browser game.  Youâ€™re a beauty expert in charge of transforming a fabulous girl with bold makeup, trendy hairstyles, and colorful manicures.  If you've ever dreamed of being a stylist or just love mixing and matching beauty looks, this free game is perfect for you.
